private_information: I specialize in extracting operator schemas and predicate signatures from textual descriptions.
I focus on action preconditions, add effects, and delete effects without introducing new assumptions.
analyst.goal: Produce a clean, unambiguous summary of the operators, predicates, and invariants needed to model the task.

private_information: I validate candidate plans against initial states and action semantics.
I derive object usage, typing hints, action applicability conditions, and reachability notes.
planner.goal: Assess the given reference plan for Scenario A, highlight any mismatches, and synthesize a consistent set of objects and typing hints usable for PDDL modeling.

orchestrator.goal: Integrate the domain analysis and plan-based synthesis to produce a final PDDL domain and a single PDDL problem instance that targets Scenario B and is solvable by Fast Downward.

public_information: Actions available: paltry(x0,x1,x2), sip(x0,x1,x2), clip(x0,x1,x2), wretched(x0,x1,x2,x3), memory(x0,x1,x2), tightfisted(x0,x1,x2).
Paltry preconditions: hand object_0, cats object_1, texture object_2, vase object_0 object_1, next object_1 object_2; effects add: next object_0 object_2; effects del: vase object_0 object_1.
Sip preconditions: hand object_0, cats object_1, texture object_2, next object_0 object_2, next object_1 object_2; effects add: vase object_0 object_1; effects del: next object_0 object_2.
Clip preconditions: hand object_0, sneeze object_1, texture object_2, next object_1 object_2, next object_0 object_2; effects add: vase object_0 object_1; effects del: next object_0 object_2.

Wretched preconditions: sneeze object_0, texture object_1, texture object_2, stupendous object_3, next object_0 object_1, collect object_1 object_3, collect object_2 object_3; effects add: next object_0 object_2; effects del: next object_0 object_1.
Memory preconditions: cats object_0, spring object_1, spring object_2, next object_0 object_1; effects add: next object_0 object_2; effects del: next object_0 object_1.
Tightfisted preconditions: hand object_0, sneeze object_1, texture object_2, next object_1 object_2, vase object_0 object_1; effects add: next object_0 object_2; effects del: vase object_0 object_1.

Scenario A initial facts: cats object_0, collect object_10 object_2, collect object_5 object_1, collect object_6 object_1, collect object_7 object_1, collect object_8 object_2, collect object_9 object_2, hand object_11, hand object_12, next object_0 object_5, next object_11 object_9, next object_12 object_10, next object_3 object_6, next object_4 object_8, sneeze object_3, sneeze object_4, spring object_5, spring object_8, stupendous object_1, stupendous object_2, texture object_10, texture object_5, texture object_6, texture object_7, texture object_8, texture object_9.
Scenario A goal: next object_11 object_7 and next object_12 object_5.

Scenario A reference plan: wretched object_3 object_6 object_5 object_1; wretched object_4 object_8 object_10 object_2; clip object_12 object_4 object_10; wretched object_4 object_10 object_9 object_2; clip object_11 object_4 object_9; wretched object_4 object_9 object_8 object_2; tightfisted object_12 object_4 object_8; tightfisted object_11 object_4 object_8; memory object_0 object_5 object_8; sip object_12 object_0 object_8; sip object_11 object_0 object_8; memory object_0 object_8 object_5; paltry object_12 object_0 object_5; paltry object_11 object_0 object_5; clip object_11 object_3 object_5; wretched object_3 object_5 object_7 object_1; tightfisted object_11 object_3 object_7.

Scenario B initial facts: cats object_0, collect object_10 object_2, collect object_5 object_1, collect object_6 object_1, collect object_7 object_1, collect object_8 object_2, collect object_9 object_2, hand object_11, hand object_12, next object_0 object_8, next object_11 object_6, next object_12 object_10, next object_3 object_7, next object_4 object_10, sneeze object_3, sneeze object_4, spring object_5, spring object_8, stupendous object_1, stupendous object_2, texture object_10, texture object_5, texture object_6, texture object_7, texture object_8, texture object_9.
Scenario B goal: next object_11 object_7 and next object_12 object_8.

context.system_prompt: You analyze domain text to extract operator schemas, predicate signatures with arities, and invariants; return a concise structured summary without emitting PDDL or code.
context.prompt: Your name is analyst. Use the public information to enumerate the six operators with parameter roles, their preconditions, add effects, and delete effects; list all predicates with their arities; note any mutex-like relationships implied by effects (e.g., toggling next or vase). Do not produce PDDL; keep it concise and consistent. Public information: {environment->public_information}

synthesis.system_prompt: You validate plans and derive modeling hints without emitting PDDL.
synthesis.prompt: Your name is planner. Validate the Scenario A reference plan step by step w.r.t. the given semantics and initial facts; report any steps that would fail and why; then synthesize object usage, suggested single type or simple typing hints, and any ordering constraints helpful for planning in Scenario B. Do not produce PDDL. Public information: {environment->public_information}

pddl.system_prompt: You are an expert with multi-agent PDDL targeting the Fast Downward solver. You must produce exactly one PDDL domain and one PDDL problem. Enclose the domain between <domain></domain> and the problem between <problem></problem>. Use STRIPS-style predicates and actions consistent with the provided semantics; name the domain ObfuscatedDeceptiveLogistics22; ensure syntax compatibility with Fast Downward; provide only the two tagged blocks.
pddl.prompt: Integrate the operator and predicate summary from the analyst and the modeling hints from the planner to produce a final PDDL domain capturing the six actions (paltry, sip, clip, wretched, memory, tightfisted) with their exact preconditions and effects as stated, and a single PDDL problem instance for Scenario B. Use constants object_0 through object_12; include all initial facts for Scenario B; set the goal to next object_11 object_7 and next object_12 object_8. Keep action names and predicate names lowercase; represent binary predicates as needed; avoid introducing extra predicates beyond those in the public information. Analyst summary: {analysis_analyst} Planner synthesis: {synthesis_planner} Public information: {environment->public_information}
